Package ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArchiveActivity
    Displays the archived shopping lists
    CreateFriendActivity
    Creates a frame to create new friends or edit them if the intent has an extra
    CreateItemActivity
    Creates a frame to create new items or edit them if the intent has an extra
    CreateListActivity
    Creates a frame to create new shopping lists or edit them if the intent has an extra
    CreateRecipeActivity
    Creates a frame to create new recipes or edit them if the intent has an extra
    FriendListActionMode
    Creates the Action Bar for Friends to edit or remove them
    HomeActivity
    The main activity of the app, which displays an overview of the shopping lists
    ItemListActivity
    Displays all Items in the database
    ManageFriendsActivity
    Creates a frame which enlists all friends and the possibility to manage them
    ManageRecipeActivity
    Creates a frame which enlists all recipes and the possibility to manage them
    RecipeListActionMode
    Creates the Action Bar for Recipes to edit or remove them
    SettingsActivity
    Activity to change the settings of the app
    ShareListActionMode
    Creates the action bar for shared lists to edit friends or remove them
    ShareListActivity
    Allows to share/synchronize lists with friends or send them as text message
    ShoppingListActionMode  
    ViewListActivity
    Displays a single shopping list including the (bought) items
    ViewRecipeActivity
    Displays a single recipe including the items
